alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 6:03PM MDT until July 16 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 603 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Chivington, or 22 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheridan Lake, Chivington and Brandon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
